about_the_game:
"

Deadlands Night Train 25th Anniversary


The Night Train lurks the tracks of the West, pulling in after dark to unleash its hellish cargo of starving, feral vampires on unsuspecting towns along the rails. For decades the Night Train has terrorized conventions and tabletops. What will you do when its deathly whistle blows? Can your posse survive the onslaught? Many others have tried and failed!
Twenty five years ago, one famous adventure encapsulated Deadlands' promise of dangerous drifters battling unliving horrors across the American West so completely it became legend itself: John Goff's Night Train. Celebrate the bloody anniversary of a masterpeice with this boxed set, updated for Savage Worlds Adventure Edition and with gorgeous new art and accessories to bring the fun to life. Or unlife, as the case may be. If you've never played Night Train, this is your chance to jump aboard! If you've ridden the rails before you'll find new extras that make this the definitive experience.
Requires the Savage Worlds core rules and Deadlands: The Weird West to play. Included in the Boxed Set:
  • Night Train--The legendary, blood-soaked original in Savage Worlds for the first time!
  • For Whom the Whistle Blows--John Goff's dark sequel to Night Train.
  • The Bank Job--An all new adventure by John Goff featuring a third encounter with the notorious vehicle.
  • Set of 6 Archetypes--Dangerous strangers to put in the Night Train's path.
  • Four Battle Maps--Three infested towns and connecting rail spur to fight through.
  • Tokens--Feral nosferatu and some innocent townsfolk for them to terrorize. Includes the locomotive and cars for the Night Train itself!
  • 4 Wanted Posters for the low-down outlaws skulking in the towns.
"
